name: FAST FOOD SHOP ONLINE
description:
Fast Food Shop Online is an online game that can be played with up to 16 players . The game is about running a fast food shop where customers will come to your shop and order food which you have to cook and prepare .

MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT
The game can be fully played in multiplayer mode with friends , including the story line

STORY LINE
The game will have a story line , which is basically about The player's father having an old debt for the mafia guys , the father dies during the story and the mafia finds out about your father's death , they start to come to your shop regularly to collect their debt , if you don't pay then you have to bear the consequences . during the story you will meet a lot of people that will help you depending on your choices , they will offer some stuff for you to buy like a vehicle or a farming land . The story also includes talking to NPCs with voice acting for all conversations .

CHOICES
The story line offers a lot of choices to be made by players which can get the player some useful items if the right choices where made .

COOKING FOOD
The cooking mechanism in the game is an advanced one where players have to take their cart / vehicle to buy cooking ingredients and deliver them back to the shop and start cutting vegetables and adding other ingredients to pots to create different food orders . also there will be an equipment shop to buy new grills and equipment to your shop .

SHOP UPGRADES
The shop will have a lot of upgrades which can be bought from the following shops in town :
1- Decoration Shop
2- Equipment Shop
3- Furniture Shop
4- Building Materials Shop
5- Car Dealer

SURVIVAL
The game has the survival aspect which includes : hunger , thirst , cleanness , health and death from car accidents or story events

FARMING
Buying a farming land will help the players grow their own vegetables and fruits , which can be used to make food in their shop or sold in the town as raw vegetables

POLICE
The police officers are always roaming in town to check if anything illegal going on , be careful with whom you decide to do business .
